item.title: Firefox instead of Chrome
item.description: Getting rid of Google in my life has lead me back to [Firefox](https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/new/) I started on the web with Netscape Navigator. I used this for years refusing to use Microsoft Explorer on anything. That was till I was bit by the Google bug. I bacame a fan boy of anything they put out. After all, Don't be evil! I began to run Chrome on everything. That was till I opened my eyes!
